title: vENDuvOm varam
sahitya:
vENDuvOm varam onru vENDum enrE nAm pANDiya pazhaniyampati ANDavanaivaNangiyE


anupallavi

  ANDU AtkoLvAn arasan pOlparivODu ANDIk-kOlam onru pUNDOn enrAlum


caraNam    iddharaNi vAzhvinil ettanaiyO vidhattil cittattai kalakki cintaiyai mayakkum
attanai Ashaikkum aDimaiyAghiDAmal nittam avan padattai ninaindiDum mati peravE
